attributes.action: Set tax (PAYE) relief for employed individuals paying private school fees.
attributes.additional_details: We - the Brits are continually being taxed - pay, home, car, road, air, school fees! etc. It's too much - encourage businesses which help the economic growth of a nation. The government cannot solve all the problems of the UK - the labour government should rethink their policies - its having a devastating impact on the British people.
attributes.background:
As an employed individual with a child in an independent school - I pay state taxes - PAYE & NI - and at the same time paying school fees which the labour government has just removed the 20% tax break for.

It's only fair that there is a tax relief for people like me not utilising state education.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We are not sure exactly what tax relief you would like to Government to provide - for example how much relief you would like to be provided. You could start a petition setting out clearly what tax relief you would like to be introduced.

You may wish to sign this petition:

Don't apply VAT to independent school fees, or remove business rates relief: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701268
